description: This source file defines the root layout component for a Remix-run web application. It sets up the HTML structure, includes external stylesheets and scripts, and manages routing outlets.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Defines external links and stylesheets including Google Fonts and preconnect links.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: Functional React component that provides the HTML structure and includes various Remix components for meta tags, styles, and scripts.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Default React component rendering the nested route outlet.
